right.item:
Indications

A leucine, isoleucine, and valine free drink or gel for use in the dietary management of Maple Syrup Urine Disease (MSUD) in children from 12 months to 10 years of age.

Product Features

  • Leucine, isoleucine, and valine free
  • Contains the necessary mixture of amino acids, carbohydrates, minerals, trace elements and vitamins to meet the daily nutritional needs of this age group
  • Provides 42g of protein equivalent per 100g of powder
  • Designed to be made into a gel or low volume drink
  • Unflavored powder with separate FlavourPac sachets available
  • Convenient and great tasting

Nutritional Information & Ingredients

Available for download at the end of this page.

Important Information

MSUD gel must only be given to patients with proven Maple Syrup Urine Disease and under strict medical supervision.  It is not recommended for infants under 12 months of age or as a sole source of nutrition.  The product does contain a source of phenylalanine. MSUD gel is not for parenteral use.

Dosage and Administration

  • Dosage of MSUD gel should be determined by the clinician or dietitian
  • The daily protein requirement is given as MSUD gel (100g is equivalent to 42g of protein).
  • Additional protein is provided from natural protein sources in medically prescribed quantities to provide leucine, isoleucine, and valine in controlled amounts, which is essential for normal development.
  • Foods high in carbohydrate and fat but low in protein should be provided as an energy source to supply the remainder of daily calories.
  • A supplement of isoleucine and valine is given if required (if plasma concentrations fall too low).

Guidelines for Preparation and Use

MSUD gel can be taken as a gel or as a low volume drink

  1. Empty the contents of a sachet into a beaker (provided), and add a FlavourPac sachet if desired. Add cold water – 30ml for a gel or half way up the beaker (100ml) for a drink. Secure the lid and shake for 10 seconds.  For the gel, let stand for 2 minutes. For the drink, serve immediately.
  2. Water or permitted drinks should be taken after the MSUD gel.
  3. Cover and refrigerate any unused formula. Use prepared formula within 24 hours. Shake well before serving.

Storage

Store unopened sachets at room temperature.  After opening, store tightly sealed sachet in a cool, dry place and use within one month.  Avoid storing product in areas of extreme temperatures.

Availability
Product Number Description Packaging NDC Format Code
053404 MSUD gel unflavored 30 x 20g sachets 50600-0535-34
